title: Spit Poison
data: {{version030}} {{flavour|Spit poison at a targeted monster.}} [[File:Spit Poison.png]] '''Spit Poison''' is an [[ability]] acquired by playing a [[Naga]], which has the [[Spit Poison mutation]]. For players, it deals 1d(9 + XL/2) [[poison]] damage{{source ref|0.30.0|zap-data.h|967}}{{source ref|0.30.0|ability.cc|746}} and has a range of 5. The cooldown is 3-7 turns. Spit Poison can be upgraded to [[Poisonous Cloud|Breathe Poison]] with any source of [[good mutation]]. ==Monster Ability== {{monsters with spell}} ==History== *Prior to [[0.19]], the Spit Poison mutation had 3 levels, with Nagas having level 2. *Prior to [[0.18]], regular species could randomly gain Spit Poison. *Prior to [[0.17]], Nagas had an exclusive Spit Poison ability separate from the mutation. ==References== [[Category:Abilities]] [[Category:Monster spells]]
